messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: With more new members than at any time in the party's history, more councillors and big gains across Britain Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are changing the way we do politics. Join this campaign - join the team that won Liverpool and Sheffield and is set for success in Eastleigh.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg's tax plan will increase the amount you can earn tax-free to £10,000 - cutting your income tax bill by £700.

issues.economy: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket. Nick Clegg's tax plan will increase the amount you can earn tax-free to £10,000 - cutting your income tax bill by £700.
issues.governance: With more new members than at any time in the party's history, more councillors and big gains across Britain Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are changing the way we do politics.

Tara Saville campaigning in the local area.
